00.message: Vroom! The noise of the train rushes in your ears.
options: Wait for the train to arrive

01.message: You wait too fast and the train hits you. The end. (Did you know? A snail can sleep for three years.)

02.message:
You arrive at work and are immediately called into a vote. Do you vote yes or no? 
'Protect Wildlife and Fish in Need of Conservation Act' - you are late and don't have time to read it, what do you vote?

03.message: Congratulations. You chose the wrong choice.. Wildlife should be protected so there isn't another extinction level event. (Did you know? The heart of a shrimp is located in its head)

04.message: You go and get some lunch. When the server hands you the burrito, they ask whether you want a plastic straw, or a cardboard straw.

05.message: As you walk out, a random stranger materializes infront of you. He asks whether you want some turtle soup or not. Do you accept?

06.message: The stranger rips off his mask and reveals he is your boss, you are now fired from the wildlife committee. The end. (Did you know? The fingerprints of a koala are so indistinguishable from humans that they have on occasion been confused at a crime scene.)

07.message: You walk back to work and think nothing of the interaction. You sit down at your computer.
options: Stare at the screen and wait for something to happen
